name: Painted House Ver 1.0
description:
A non photo-realistic post processing material that imitates painted look on scene objects. In this project I used it to generate a painted effect on a high poly house model. 

This project contains an implementation of a post-processing material that created painted effect based on normal and noise map information. The materials includes all necessary control parameters that can be tweaked to achieve different results accordingly. Entirely created using Unreal Engine 4 BP (Blueprints).
